verses.roman:
pāda-pīṭa-mukuṭāgra-saṅghaṭṭe uṭhe dhvani
pāda-pīṭhe stuti kare mukuṭa hena jāni'

synonyms: pāda-pīṭa—at Kṛṣṇa's lotus feet; mukuṭa-agra—of the tops of the helmets; saṅghaṭṭe—in the crowding together; uṭhe dhvani—there arose a sound; pāda-pīṭhe stuti—offering prayers unto the lotus feet; kare—do; mukuṭa—the helmets; hena jāni'-appearing as such.
translation: "When all the helmets struck together at Kṛṣṇa's lotus feet, there was a tumultuous sound. It appeared that the helmets themselves were offering prayers unto Kṛṣṇa's lotus feet.
